systemDescription.name: Navigation System
systemDescription.description: The Navigation System in the IVI allows users to search for destinations, plan routes, and receive turn-by-turn guidance through visual and audio cues. It integrates with vehicle sensors, GPS, and network services to provide real-time position, traffic information, and route optimization.
operatingConditions: GPS signal availability may vary by location

safetyGoals.description: The Navigation System shall not provide dangerously incorrect or misleading guidance that could lead to unsafe driving maneuvers
safetyGoals.rationale: Incorrect navigation instructions could lead to sudden or dangerous maneuvers in traffic, potentially causing accidents

decomposedRequirements.description: The IVI system shall validate navigation instructions against map data and vehicle position before presentation to the driver
The IVI system shall provide sufficient advance notice of upcoming maneuvers
The IVI system shall include appropriate disclaimers for all navigation guidance

safetyGoals.description: The Navigation System shall not cause excessive driver distraction through complex interactions or visual elements
safetyGoals.rationale: Complex navigation interactions while driving could lead to prolonged distraction and increased accident risk

decomposedRequirements.description: The IVI system shall limit navigation interactions while vehicle is in motion
The IVI system shall provide simplified visual guidance appropriate for at-a-glance viewing
The IVI system shall provide clear audio instructions to minimize visual distraction

hazardAnalysis.description: Incorrect navigation instructions at critical junctions
hazardAnalysis.operationalSituation: Vehicle approaching complex junction at normal traffic speeds
hazardAnalysis.hazardousEvent: Driver performs late or sudden lane change or turn based on incorrect navigation instruction

hazardAnalysis.description: Outdated map data causing incorrect routing
hazardAnalysis.operationalSituation: Vehicle driving in area with recent road changes
hazardAnalysis.hazardousEvent: Driver follows navigation into prohibited or dangerous area

hazardAnalysis.description: Navigation system requiring complex interaction while driving
hazardAnalysis.operationalSituation: Vehicle in motion on busy road
hazardAnalysis.hazardousEvent: Driver attention diverted for extended period during complex navigation interaction

hazardAnalysis.description: Navigation display overloading driver with information
hazardAnalysis.operationalSituation: Vehicle in motion in complex traffic situation
hazardAnalysis.hazardousEvent: Driver distracted by complex or cluttered navigation display

item.name: Navigation System
item.function: Provide route planning and turn-by-turn guidance to destinations

failureModes.description: Delayed or missing navigation instructions at critical junctions
potentialCauses: Map data inaccuracy or outdated information

failureEffects.local: Navigation instruction delivered too late or missed entirely
failureEffects.nextLevel: Driver continues on incorrect route or makes sudden maneuver
failureEffects.endEffect: Potential traffic violation or collision due to unexpected maneuver

prevention: Implement predictive instruction timing based on vehicle speed
Use high-precision GPS with multiple correction sources
detection: Monitor timing of instruction delivery versus junction proximity
Verify map data accuracy with multiple sources

mitigations.description: Provide advance warnings for upcoming maneuvers with distance countdown
Implement visual and audible instruction repetition for critical junctions

safetyRequirements.description: The Navigation System shall provide initial turn instructions at least 500m before the maneuver point for speeds above 50 km/h
The Navigation System shall provide both visual and audible instructions for all critical maneuvers

failureModes.description: Incorrect routing due to outdated map data

failureEffects.local: Navigation system provides routing based on outdated road information
failureEffects.nextLevel: Driver follows incorrect or invalid route guidance
failureEffects.endEffect: Vehicle directed into prohibited areas, closed roads, or hazardous conditions

prevention: Implement regular automatic map data updates
Integrate real-time traffic and road closure information
detection: Verify map data version and recency on startup

mitigations.description: Disclaimer about map data limitations with driver verification requirement
Integration with real-time traffic data to detect road changes

safetyRequirements.description: The Navigation System shall verify map data recency at system startup and notify the driver if updates are required
The Navigation System shall integrate real-time traffic and road closure information when calculating routes

failureModes.description: Complex destination entry requiring extended attention
potentialCauses: Poor UI design for destination entry
Complex search algorithm requiring multiple steps
Lack of input validation or suggestion features

failureEffects.local: Driver needs extended time to input destination
failureEffects.nextLevel: Driver attention diverted from road for excessive period
failureEffects.endEffect: Increased risk of collision due to prolonged distraction

prevention: Disable complex destination entry while driving
detection: Monitor interaction time for destination entry
Track driver attention metrics during interaction

mitigations.description: Disable keyboard entry while vehicle is in motion
Provide voice control for destination entry

safetyRequirements.description: The Navigation System shall disable manual text entry functions when vehicle speed exceeds 5 km/h
The Navigation System shall provide voice control for destination entry that requires minimal visual confirmation

failureModes.description: Visually distracting or cluttered navigation display
potentialCauses: Excessive information density on map view
Poor contrast or readability of navigation elements

failureEffects.local: Navigation display requires extended viewing to comprehend
failureEffects.nextLevel: Driver frequently glances at display for extended periods
failureEffects.endEffect: Increased risk of collision due to visual distraction

detection: User studies evaluating glance time for navigation information
A/B testing of display formats for distraction potential

mitigations.description: Automatic simplification of display when vehicle is in motion
Clear audio guidance to reduce dependence on visual display

safetyRequirements.description: The Navigation System shall automatically switch to simplified guidance mode with reduced information density when vehicle speed exceeds 20 km/h
The Navigation System shall provide clear audio instructions for all maneuvers to reduce reliance on visual display

safetyMechanisms.mechanism: Tiered audio and visual guidance system
safetyMechanisms.implementationDetails: System provides initial notification at 500m, reminder at 200m, and final instruction at 50m before maneuver point, with visual countdown indicators

safetyMechanisms.mechanism: Multiple data source validation for map accuracy
safetyMechanisms.implementationDetails: System cross-references map data with cloud-based real-time traffic information and road closure databases
System disables keyboard input and complex destination search when vehicle speed exceeds 5 km/h

safetyMechanisms.mechanism: Speech recognition for hands-free navigation control
safetyMechanisms.implementationDetails: System provides full-featured voice control for destination entry and route modifications with minimal visual confirmation
System automatically switches to high-contrast, reduced information display mode at speeds above 20 km/h

testCases.testProcedure: Test navigation system on predefined route at various speeds and measure instruction timing relative to maneuver points
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: Initial instructions provided at least 500m before junction at speeds above 50 km/h

testCases.testProcedure: Navigate predefined route and verify both visual and audio instructions for all maneuvers
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: 100% of critical maneuvers have both visual and audio instructions

testCases.testProcedure: Start navigation system with outdated maps and verify notification behavior
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: System detects outdated maps and notifies user with appropriate warning

testCases.testProcedure: Create route through area with simulated road closure and observe system response
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: System reroutes to avoid closed road using real-time data

testCases.description: Verify motion lock for text entry
testCases.testProcedure: Attempt text entry for destination at various vehicle speeds
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: Keyboard input disabled at speeds above 5 km/h

testCases.testProcedure: Test voice commands for destination entry and route modification while driving
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: Voice commands successfully process 95% of standard destination entry requests with minimal visual confirmation

testCases.testProcedure: Drive at various speeds and observe display mode changes
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: System switches to simplified display above 20 km/h with reduced information density

testCases.testProcedure: Test audio instructions in various ambient noise conditions and verify comprehension
testCases.acceptanceCriteria: Audio instructions clearly audible and comprehensible in 90% of normal driving conditions
